entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
